tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

title_narrative: Contribution to UNMAS: Strengthening humanitarian mine action response in Sudan
Contributo a UNMAS per il rafforzamento dello sminamento umanitario in Sudan
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The contribution of the Italian Cooperation to UNMAS will strengthen the humanitarian mine action response in Sudan, through explosive ordnance disposal and mine clearance as well as through capacity buildingactivities in favor of the National Mine Action Center and the finalization of the Regional Mine Action Training Center

Il contributo della Cooperazione Italiana a UNMAS contribuirà al rafforzamento dello sminamento umanitario in Sudan, attraverso la rimozione elo smaltimento di ordigni esplosivi, attività dicapacity-building del CentroNazionale per lo Sminamento e il completamento del Centro Regionale di Formazione per l'azione contro le mine.
